text: Slick is the surname of: * Grace Slick (born 1939), American singer and songwriter * Joe Slick (born 1977), American retired mixed martial arts fighter * Thomas Baker Slick Sr. (1883-1930), discoverer of Oklahoma's then- largest oil field * Thomas Whitten Slick (1869–1959), United States federal judge * Tom Slick (Thomas Baker Slick, Jr.) (1916–1962), American inventor and businessman, son of Thomas Slick, Sr.
title: Slick (surname)
